key.name: cmd-win-optsize
key.description: Resize the focused window to a size based on the monitor work area and center it.

key.name: win-optsize-config
key.description: JSON config for win_optsize breakpoints and scales.

key.name: keybinding-flags
key.description: Meta.KeyBindingFlags name or numeric value used for extension keybindings.

key.name: keybinding-actionmode
key.description: Shell.ActionMode name or numeric value used for extension keybindings.
